mapper.update: Update anime A Set name_main = AN.name_main, name_english = AN.name_english From animenamelookupsummary AN where AN.anime_id = A.anime_id AND (A.name_main <> AN.name_main OR A.name_english <> AN.name_english)
mapper.insert: Insert Into animename(anime_id, anime_name, name_type, name_lang) Select anime_id, anime_name, name_type, name_lang From animenamelookup Where anime_id in (Select anime_id from anime)
